models.name: NetAtmo Indoor Module
models.description: Use indoor temperature, relative humidity and CO2 readings to live in a healthier home.

models.name: Nest Thermostat
models.description: The Nest thermostat learns the temps you like, turns itself down when you're away, and has remote control through Wi-Fi.

models.name: NetAtmo Outdoor Module
models.description: Use real-time weather readings to dress comfortably, select the most appropriate transportation and plan your leisure activities.

models.name: NetAtmo Rain Module
models.description: Measure the precise amount of rainfall. Receive an alert when it rains and only water your plants when you need to. Analyze your data using a histogram.

models.name: NetAtmo Thermostat
models.description: Control your heating wherever you are with the Thermostat for Smartphone designed by Starck.

models.name: Bosh Dishwasher
models.description: Welcome to Home Connect and a new way of living. You can now control household appliances made by selected European brands even when away from home, thus giving you more time and energy.

models.name: Nest Smoke + CO Alarm
